#--------->>>>>>> Defining the flow name
name: Vite React CI/CD Pipeline with needs test

#---------->>>>> Defining the "ON" condetion
on:
  push:
    branches: [main]
    path-ignore:
      - '.github/workflows'
  pull_request:
    branches: [main]
  workflow_dispatch:

#---------->>>>> Defining the "JOBS"
jobs:
  # Making the build process
  build:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest # Defining the "OS"
    steps: # Steps to make the build folder
      #------- Checkout process ----------
      - name: ğŸ“¥ Checkout Repository
        uses: actions/checkout@v4
      #------- Checkout process ----------

      #------- Setting up node version ----------
      - name: âš™ï¸ Setup Node.js
        uses: actions/setup-node@v4
        with:
          node-version: "20"
      #------- Setting up node version ----------

      #------- Installing Dependencies ----------
      - name: ğŸ“¦ Install Dependencies
        run: npm install
      #------- Installing Dependencies ----------

      #------- Making Build Vite React App ----------
      - name: ğŸ› ï¸ Build Vite React App
        run: npm run build
      #------- Making Build Vite React App ----------

      #------- Uploading build artifacts ----------
      - name: ğŸ“¦ Upload build artifacts
        uses: actions/upload-artifact@v4
        with:
          name: dist
          path: ./dist
      #------- Uploading build artifacts ----------


  test: # Test job
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest # Defining the "OS"
    needs: build # it needs build job to be completed to perform test
    steps:
      #------- Checkout process ----------
      - name: ğŸ“¥ Checkout Repository
        uses: actions/checkout@v4
      #------- Checkout process ----------

      #------- Setting up node version ----------
      - name: âš™ï¸ Setup Node.js
        uses: actions/setup-node@v4
        with:
          node-version: "20"
      #------- Setting up node version ----------

      #------- Installing Dependencies ----------
      - name: ğŸ“¦ Install Dependencies
        run: npm install
      #------- Installing Dependencies ----------

      #------- Run Tests ----------
      - name: ğŸ§ª Run Tests
        run: npm test --if-present
      #------- Run Tests ----------

  deploy: # Deploy job
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest # Defining the "OS"
    needs: test # it needs test job to be completed to perform deployment
    steps:
      #------- Checkout process ----------
      - name: ğŸ“¥ Checkout Repository
        uses: actions/checkout@v4
      #------- Checkout process ----------

      #------- Download build artifacts ----------
      - name: ğŸ“¥ Download build artifacts
        uses: actions/download-artifact@v4
        with:
          name: dist
          path: ./dist
      #------- Download build artifacts ----------

      #------- Deploy to Netlify ----------
      - name: ğŸ“¤ Deploy to Netlify
        uses: nwtgck/actions-netlify@v2
        with:
          publish-dir: "./dist"
          production-deploy: true
        #------- Deploy to Netlify ----------


        env:
          NETLIFY_AUTH_TOKEN: ${{ secrets.NETLIFY_AUTH_TOKEN }}
          NETLIFY_SITE_ID: ${{ secrets.NETLIFY_SITE_ID }}
